title: LEGEND$234R5
author: LEGEND$234R5
content: Hello I am looing for a loan of 250$ for bitcoin trading I can show you demo trades, will pay back in 8 weeks max and I will pay back 300$. You can have acess to my trading acc* , email and other accounts and report me if I scam you. This will be a verified account I will be trading with I have 2 accounts, 1st one is name, GOVT ID. verfied, in binance  . I dont have any collateral tho

comments.author: condoras
comments.body: Quote from: LEGEND$234R5 on September 25, 2023, 02:53:39 PMI dont have any collateral thoLock your thread then, and look elsewhere.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Then why don't you come with your main account, instead using a brand new one for asking the loan? Or we are supposed to believe that you are a legit newbie who came here for the first time and decided to ask for a loan minutes after registering?The only thing that you can get here is a negative feedback so better lock this thread.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: LEGEND$234R5 on September 25, 2023, 02:53:39 PMHello I am looing for a loan of 250$ for bitcoin trading I can show you demo trades, Demo trading results are not a measure of how good you are in trading. There is more to trading than just using Demo funds. Emotions are a big part of trading, and they usually kick in when you are using real funds, worse still borrowed funds. Imagine the kind of pressure you will haveDemo trading results can be doctored. You will always get demo funds every time you blow up your demo accounts until the one time you have a perfect streak, and that's what you will show us here as a successful trader account.No collateral, no loan.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: No collateral No Loan!if you're not able to get 250 usd from friends or family members (that ok is not the lowest amount on hearth but it's something that anyone/anywhere could achieve) why did you think random people on internet should make this loan? ok demo trading and more bla bla... and if you have some urgent expenses? or you're dealing with a scam exchange? how did you plan to repay back your loan? Well, this discussion can continue more and more examples.... but it will be always the same... NO COLLATERAL NO LOAN!Quote from: LEGEND$234R5 on September 25, 2023, 02:53:39 PMHello I am looing for a loan of 250$ for bitcoin trading I can show you demo trades, will pay back in 8 weeks max and I will pay back 300$.
